Job Title: Multiple roles: Business Analyst, OCM and Data Manager
Ad Text:
Federal Government ServiceNow CRM Platform â€“ Multiple Roles

Protected Environment | Large-Scale Transformation

We are supporting the delivery of a federal government ServiceNow CRM platform, designed to enable secure, scalable, and integrated stakeholder engagement across a complex, highly regulated organisation. The platform will be delivered in phases, commencing with a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) within a protected ServiceNow environment, and evolving into an enduring, dual-platform CRM spanning internal and public-facing domains.

We are seeking experienced professionals to support delivery across data, change, training, and business analysis, working closely with senior stakeholders in a federal government environment.







ðŸ“Š Data Manager

Role Overview

The Data Manager will oversee data migration, consolidation, and governance, ensuring data is accurate, secure, and compliant across multiple enterprise systems.

Key Responsibilities

Lead CRM data migration and consolidation activities

Establish and enforce data governance and quality standards

Manage de-duplication, harmonisation, and validation processes

Support secure and compliant data outcomes in a protected environment

Key Deliverables

Data Migration Plan and Data Mapping documentation

Data Quality Assessment and Data Governance Framework

De-duplication and harmonisation reports

Data validation and post-migration verification artefacts







ðŸ”„ OCM Manager / Training Lead

Role Overview

This role is responsible for Organisational Change Management (OCM) and training delivery, ensuring stakeholders and end users are prepared, engaged, and confident in adopting new CRM processes and capabilities.

Key Responsibilities

Develop and execute OCM and training strategies

Lead stakeholder engagement and communication planning

Conduct change impact and readiness assessments

Design and deliver training materials and sessions

Support adoption, transition, and post-go-live uptake

Key Deliverables

OCM strategy, roadmap, and benchmark reporting

External stakeholder engagement and outreach strategy

Customer experience framework and feedback mechanisms

Training needs analysis and training roadmap

Quick reference guides, onboarding materials, CBT modules, videos and webinars

Training completion and adoption metrics







ðŸ“‹ Business Analyst

Role Overview

The Business Analyst will bridge business needs and technical delivery, ensuring CRM solutions align with organisational objectives, governance requirements, and operational priorities.

Key Responsibilities

Elicit, analyse, and document business requirements

Facilitate stakeholder workshops and engagement sessions

Develop functional and non-functional specifications

Refine and prioritise user stories

Maintain end-to-end requirements traceability

Support solution design, development, and testing

Identify and proactively manage risks, issues, and gaps

Key Deliverables

Validated business requirements and specifications

Prioritised user stories and backlog artefacts

Requirements traceability documentation

Stakeholder workshop outcomes and decision records







Why Join This Program?

Contribute to a major federal government digital transformation

Work within a Protected ServiceNow environment

Engage senior stakeholders across a large, complex organisation

Help deliver an enduring national-scale CRM capability
